sentences.en: At the time , Indonesia , smarting from the Asian crisis , was grateful for Singapore's capital.
sentences.cn: 它持有两家当地电信公司的大多数股份, 受到了人们的非议.

sentences.en: HEPATOLOGY DIGEST: How do you think about the significance the CISHMS meeting between China and Indonesia?
sentences.cn: 《国际肝病》: 你认为本次会议对于中印两国交流有何意义?

sentences.en: In Indonesia , Christian's holy days like Christmas and Easter are celebrated.
sentences.cn: 基督教的圣日,譬如圣诞节和复活节都是可以庆祝的.

sentences.en: In Indonesia and Vietnam it took second place, to Japan.
sentences.cn: 令委员会感到意外的是, 中国的总体吸引力仅仅排在第三位.

sentences.en: In Indonesia she finds yet another piece of herself: the balance between the pleasures of eating and praying.
sentences.cn: 在印度尼西亚，她又找到了另一份自我：在吃的乐趣与祈祷的乐趣之间的平衡。

sentences.en: In Indonesia, for example, on the coast of Aceh, only one hospital remains operational.
sentences.cn: 例如，在印度尼西亚的亚齐海岸，只有一所医院仍在运转。

sentences.en: Indonesia bank offers quite a decent interest rate for Singapore dollar deposits.
sentences.cn: 收益与风险通常是成正比的.

sentences.en: It is an increasing presence in Thailand and Indonesia.
sentences.cn: 在泰国和印尼，它是一个日益增长的存在。

sentences.en: Ivan , Indonesia client , came to buy more products and parts of our company.
sentences.cn: Ivan前来洽谈采购我公司产品和零备件.

sentences.en: Membership includes Thailand, Cambodia , Laos , Vietnam, Brunei Daru alam , Indonesia , Malaysia , Myanmar, Phili ines and Singapore.
sentences.cn: 成员国包括泰国 、 埔寨 、 挝 、 南 、 莱 、 尼、来西亚、甸、律宾和新加坡.

sentences.en: On his third and last trip, he fell overboard on the way back to Indonesia.
sentences.cn: 我祖父去了三个来回,最后一次回来途中, 不慎落海.

sentences.en: Rescuers recover a victim at the mine tunnel in West Sumatra, Indonesia, on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 周二,搜救人员从煤矿中救起了一名受害者.

sentences.en: Saya akan berkonser di Shanghai tanggal 1 bulan September nanti ( sebelumnya di Hongkong , Malaysia dan Indonesia ).
sentences.cn: 我将在9月1日在上海开演唱会.

sentences.en: We have the example of Aceh, Indonesia, to guide us.
sentences.cn: 我们可用印尼亚齐省这一范例指导我们的工作。
